explains: v. （使）团聚，（使）重聚；（使）再结合，（使）重新团结

sentences.en: His effort to reunite families began with a Christmas gift from his mother.
sentences.cn: 他试图让家人团聚的努力源于母亲送的一份圣诞礼物。

sentences.en: In addition, family reunions frequently attract blood relatives from faraway places who spend considerable money and time to reunite.
sentences.cn: 此外，家庭团聚经常会吸引远方来的血亲，他们会花费大量的金钱和时间来团聚。

sentences.en: His first job will be to reunite the army.
sentences.cn: 他的第一项任务将是重新统一军队。
